overview:
Peter Goeren is an individual with creativity and the passion to excite others about new developing products.

He is the founder of his own Company and produces a product called the &#8220;talking resume&#8221; giving a new perspective on the idea of resumes for the modern consumer. He has a passion to create new and exciting ideas while also finding ways to incorporate them into our growing society. He is a recent graduate from the Ohio State University in Communications who after taking an interest in the technology business moved to San Francisco to produce and sell his product. Although his passions are in product management, he is looking to collaborate with other individuals about creatively solving the connection between online and offline communities.
